title: Cloud Developer (m/f) - MED-EL Medical Electronics
subtitle: Innsbruck, T 6020
body:
MED-EL is a leading manufacturer of innovative medical devices for the treatment of various types and degrees of hearing loss. Our unique portfolio of implantable hearing solutions benefits thousands of individuals in more than 100 countries worldwide. With headquarters in Innsbruck, Austria, MED-EL has over 2200 employees around the world. In support of our continuing growth, we currently have an open position with focus on:

Cloud Developer (m/f)

RD_AI22001
Innsbruck, Austria

Cloud Developer (m/f)

RD_AI22001
Innsbruck, Austria

Main Tasks

  • Design and develop robust, scalable, secure, high-performance and high-volume production applications serving users worldwide
  • Advise on cloud architectures; build, analyze and maintain cloud systems
  • Design, implement, document and inspect software modules and microservices
  • Develop operation workflows and processes; document integration solutions

Requirements

  • Bachelor or Master in Systems Engineering, Computer Science or a related technical field or equivalent practical experience (cloud system certifications)
  • Expert knowledge of .NET Core and C# with a strong focus on Web API (REST and gRPC); good programming skills in other object-oriented languages
  • Working knowledge of NoSQL databases and expert knowledge of data-modeling techniques
  • Deep understanding of cloud architectures; cloud monitoring and maintenance skills; knowledge of cloud-native technologies such as Docker, Kubernetes, Helm, and Networking is also essential
  • General knowledge of recent research in neural networks and artificial intelligence would be a considerable advantage; strong desire for exploring, evaluating, and understanding new technologies

We offer

Salary will be determined based on professional experience; the formal minimum salary according to Collective Bargaining Agreement is EUR 37,022.44


We offer a challenging opportunity in a multinational work environment with English as our company language. We look forward to receiving your application at jobs.medel.com


 

Your contact:
